title: Tour de France stage 17: Vingegaard makes huge GC gains as Poga훾ar cracks, Gall goes solo to victory
content:
Poga훾ar blows up on crushing Col de la Loze ascent, falls to more than seven minutes back on GC in gruelling Alpine 'queen stage'.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 17: Vingegaard makes huge GC gains as Poga훾ar cracks, Gall goes solo to victory on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
